explanation: [0-0] On a basketball court, a man in a gray T-shirt stands under the basket, looking to the left. He is surrounded by four children. Photographers are taking pictures on the sidelines, the stands are filled with spectators, and there are many basketballs on the court.
[0-2] Then the man in gray turns around and hands the basketball in his hand to the little boy behind him. The little boy takes the ball and starts dribbling forward.

[2-11] Then the scene switches to the little boy facing two defenders. He successfully dribbles past them, causing them to fall to the ground.
